TopicTitle: One sentence you could say to annoy an entire fan base?

Articles.Content: You need the #0 in your imgur code.
Joffrey was the kind of king that Westeros really needed.

Lately, Kinetic Void sound like Keen Ethic Void. (JK or not the Dr. no know now, and yes he did It.)

wich is not far from (o)k in ethic void ... *shrug*

Edited November 3, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''
Kerbal Space Program is so unrealistic because it has gravity in space.
2001: A Space Odyssey was stupid for having all that classical music instead of explosions and engine sounds in space.
Apollo 13 was purely made up because nobody died.

Apollo 13 was purely made up because nobody died.

Years ago I lent someone my video of Apollo 13. She said it was fun but the ending was really predictable.

Years ago I lent someone my video of Apollo 13. She said it was fun but the ending was really predictable.

I felt the same way about Titanic. Such heavy foreshadowing of what would happen to the ship.

On topic:

Titanic is James Cameron's best film.
Michael bay's transformers is better than gravity.
A portal gun breaks many laws of physics and is therefore impossible.
DayZ is perfect just the way it is.
Who needs another Half Life?
Illuminati jokes are overused.
Disney movies are for kids, who likes them anyway?

"Minecraft is for 12-year old COD players who can't stop talking about "dat swag" because it's dumb."

Wow, such irony since I play Minecraft.

Doctor Who is stupid, unrealistic, boring, too complicated, and their accents are stupid*

*watching Doctor Who right now

ooh, just got another:

Interstellar is unrealistic, boring and stupid

I would hurt someone if they said that and meant it

Edited November 25, 2014 by xXIndestructibleEVAXx
Gravity has unrealistic orbital mechanics.
ESA should stop wasting money on rubbish like Rosetta. They screwed it up anyway.
"Who wants to watch a 1 hour 15 minute movie about a girl who can create ice on command?"

Everything is a better love story than Twilight.

cue angry letters from all 3 fans of twilight lurking this forum
Launching frogs with big heads into big circles is a waste of time.

ESA should stop wasting money on rubbish like Rosetta. They screwed it up anyway.

Shirtgate was the most important part of the Rosetta/Philae story anyway.

Launching frogs with big heads into big circles is a waste of time.
I have no idea what you're even on about.

I have no idea what you're even on about.

He's referring to kerbals.
Use the force, Harry! Said Captain Kirk of the Equestrian army, as Commander Shepard throws the tiara in Mount Doom.
